programme.title: Dickey Betts: Ramblin'
programme.desc: Dickey Betts: Ramblin' - Surrounded by music from an early age, Dickey Betts (lead guitar) has created a distinctive sound fusion of different genres such as blues, rock, country, and jazz. This concert shows an intimate performance of the band, in which Dickey Betts is accompanied by Damon Fowler (lead/slide guitarist) and his son Duane Betts (lead guitar). The band also includes long-time band members Frankie Lombardi (drums), Steve Camilleri (drums), Pedro Arevalo (bass), and Mike Kach (keyboard). In addition, guitarist Devon Allman makes a special guest appearance on the song "Midnight Rider." Other songs in this exceptional performance include "Ramblin' Man," "Jessica," and more.
